meanings.definition: The act of performing in a play or film.
meanings.sent1: Her actings in the school play were impressive.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching the actings of talented actors on stage.
meanings.sent3: The cat's actings in trying to catch the laser pointer were hilarious.
meanings.sent4: His actings as a detective were so convincing, it felt like he was solving a real case.
meanings.sent5: The actings of the lead actress left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: The process of taking action or doing something.
meanings.sent1: Swift actings are needed to prevent further damage.
meanings.sent2: Effective actings are crucial in times of crisis.
meanings.sent3: The actings of the squirrel gathering nuts were quite efficient.
meanings.sent4: Her actings in organizing the event were like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The actings of the firefighters saved many lives during the fire.

meanings.definition: The manner in which something is done or carried out.
meanings.sent1: His careful actings ensured the project's success.
meanings.sent2: The actings of the chef in the kitchen were precise and skillful.
meanings.sent3: The robot's actings in cleaning the house were methodical and thorough.
meanings.sent4: The actings of the team in executing the plan were flawless.
meanings.sent5: The actings of the artist in painting the portrait were meticulous and detailed.
